Desc.eng: You did it! Now I know why you seemed so familiar. You must be Van Helsing!
Don’t even mention his fearless ghost companion! She simply hates fame. And fortune.
You must be confusing me with my father. But of course, I’m here to help.
In that case you won’t mind hunting down the other beasts too, will you? We saw some other creatures prowling the streets.
I’ll deal with them. That’s why I’m here.
I can’t do that. Sorry. I must save the city first.
